tracks.text: Muscular legs walk forward. Twin green blades dangle to side. The thighs bear large, dark scars.
Muscular arms and abs also bear scars.
Sunraku wears only blue shorts and a blue bird mask.
Red text appears, Shangri-La Frontier. Beyond the text is an expanse of mountains, forests, plains, and cities. We zoom out and the expanse is reflected in VR goggles worn by Rakuro
At night, Sunraku stands in a misty field
Moon light shines over Sunraku as he stands near large rocks.
Rakuro smiles. His image glitches into Sunraku, whose brow furrows
Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, twirls a spear in a forest.
A girl with blond pig tails walks forward. Looking away from us, she puts her hands on her hips.
A large knight wears a helmet. Emul wears a suit and top hat. She leaps and is replaced by her human form.
Vysache wears an eye patch. He holds a carrot shaped smoking pipe and sits cross legged in a low lit, traditional Japanese room
A man wearing armor and a purple cape sits on a box in a storage room.
Lycagon bears fangs over a forest, backdropped by a red moon. Yellow lines shine around her red, glowing eyes.
Sunraku runs through the woods. He leaps, and crosses in front of a full moon.
Flying through the air, he kicks and punches goblins. Holding red twin knives, he cuts at more goblins.
With red glowing fists, the blond girl fires energy blasts at goblins. Pencilgon strikes human sized wasps. They fight back to back.
Vysache, with a scar over his right eye, slowly opens his eyes.
Pencilgon strikes with a sword. The blond girl punches with a fire ball.
The knight strikes the ground, and the ground explodes with brilliant light that fades to lightning.
A town of small red houses and rabbit shaped motifs. A large temple rests at the top of a giant tree.
The town fades into the bird man's red eye
Emul leaps up, smiling.
In a forest glowing with a red mist, the blond girl, Sunraku, and Pencilgon walk side by side.
Sword strike. Animalia gapes.
He looks up at her player name. Label, Skull, Arthur Pencilgon, Level 99
Red skull icon
Pencilgon's purple hair and long, pointy earrings blows in the wind. She smiles down at him with blue eyes. Human Emul hides behind Sunraku. She gapes, with wide red eyes.
At an Item Shop, an axe smashes a Sales Counter.
The burglar knights pick up a silver goblet. The 2 run away.
A burglar turns around.
Sunraku, wearing knight armor, wields a club.
Dozens of knights run at a horde of monsters.
A player holds a bag and smiles down a killed players.
A tattered red flag billows
Pencil Knight
The sun rises over the kingdom
A knight's body lies over red. Dozens of dead knights lie scattered across a hallway. 2 figures walk down the center along a red carpet.
Katzo Tataki, a black knight, and Sunraku, a white knight. Sunraku kneels near a body.
He opens the doors. Pencil Knight sits on a throne at the top of stairs, holding a sword.
She smiles down from the throne. In SLF, she smiles down from the gate entrance.
She flies down the stairs and swings her sword at his head. He lowers.
She pivots over his shoulder, lands on the ground, drives her sword in the ground to slow her momentum, and throws 3 purple daggers. He dodges 2 and parries the third.
Emul runs to the sidelines, near Animalia
Emul's ears reappear. She hides them with her hands.
In Unite the Rounds, Pencil Knight's Kingdom smokes. Pencil Knight sits on a burning throne, smiling.
They exchange blows rapidly.
He parries a blow, then backflips back.
Knives out, Sunraku runs towards her.
She blocks, then backflips away.
She stands in front of the gate steps, brandishing the sword. Emul's tail reappears.
She tries to hide her ears and tail. Animalia bites her nails, watching Sunraku brandish knives.
She turns to Emul.
Animalia taps Emul's shoulder. She jumps and explodes in pink smoke.
Bunny ears. Animalia looks down. Red eyes, little pink nose. Animalia's eyes grow wide.
Bunny Emul like, paws out, in Animalia's hands. She blushes and squeals.
Animalia drools and pants. Her tongue hangs out
Repel Counter
He jump kicks her backwards.
Pencilgon runs after them.
An explosion forms between them.
She stops and shields her face
He drives his heel into the ground, slowing. 4 figures stand in front of him. PKers Ketchum, Lass, Branch, and Remy.
Sunraku dodges an axe from Branch.
Ketchum swings a long sword. Sunraku leaps.
Animalia's crescent shaped bone staff glows, forming 5 colored orbs.
Streams of yellow, red, green, blue, and purple fly towards Pencilgon.
Animalia watches the prismatic explosion. Shockwaves blow back her flowing robe.
She smiles, then her face falls.
The streams of color gather around Pencilgon's chestplate. They strobe less and less until they disappear.
She points, and a prismatic miasma flies back and Animalia.
She flies back and rolls across the ground.
She glares. PKer Lass swings at Sunraku. He dodges. Branch swings. He dodges.
The 4 attack at once.
The white knight descends from the sky and strikes Ketchum. The explosion kicks dirt hundreds of feet in the air.
Ketchum's upper half rolls away.
The white knight looks solemnly back at Sunraku, who sweats.
Rei's house.
A Yojijukugo wall scroll, bearing 4 character kanji, reads "Constant Progress".
Rei holds her head in her hands, staring off into space.
At the game store
Mana gives a thumbs up. Rei blushes.
In her room, Rei eyes her VR helmet.
She sits on her bed.
She lies back, and crosses her hands over her torso. She wears a modest, collared, button down blouse and long skirt.
Dialog, You've received a mailbird from Psyger-100.
The white knight sits up in a Secondale Inn

Dear Psyger-0, Sorry, but I need you to pause your private player hunt. There's a player I really need to talk to. Can you find him for me? He was last sighted near Secondale. He seems to have a talking, clothed Vorpal Bunny with him.
In Secondale, people stare at the white knight, Psyger-0.
Psyger-0's legs glow green.
She runs, kicking up a cloud of dust in her wake.
Sunraku fights the 4 PKers
PKer Lass swings at Sunraku. He dodges.
Pencilgon's face falls.
The 3 remaining PKers step back from the dust cloud.
The dust parts around Psyger-0
Animalia pulls a bone hand staff from her robe.
Rakuro floats, as if in water. Debris floats around him.
He reaches out a hand. The debris glitters.
He opens his blue eyes. He has short, spiky blue hair.
Pixels float in cyberspace. We follow a tunnel of light
Grass blows before an orange sunset.
Sunraku, bearing Lycagon's Mark, stands.
Rei opens her brown eyes. She has short brown hair that wraps around her face.
Sunraku walks on a path with Emul, a white bunny wearing a blue coat, red vest, and top hat. Emul twirls and back flips.
Surrounded by stone columns, Psyger-0, a knight appears. Her armor is white and lined in gold. Her helmet bears a long, red plume.
Arthur Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, looks determined. Her hair moves gently in the wind.
A blond woman looks up. She has shoulder length hair tied up in pig tails.
Sunraku stares up as clouds roll over a blue sky. It glows yellow with a sunset, then darkens to a dark purple moon.
His bird mask feathers blows in the wind.
Pencilgon stands on a cliff in front of the moon, her hands on her hips.
The blond woman crouches on an outcropping, in front of the moon
Sunraku and Psyger-0 stand, facing opposite directions, surrounded by floating debris, backdropped by a nebula that glows prismatically from red to green to blue.
Blue pixels float in cyberspace as we fly through a tunnel of light
Elementary students sit in front of a stage. Sunraku pushes the word SLF Mini
Text, 9, Is the food bad in SLF?
Emul eats a carrot.
He sits at a table full of cheeseburger towers.
He stares. She munches happily.
He eats her carrot.
Dialog, One level of flavor limiter has been removed.
Text, Flavor limiters are removed through consumption of high-quality food items.
Post-episode footnote: A yojijukugo term is a Japanese idiomatic expression containing 4 kanji characters. The phrase on Rei's wall is nisshigeppo, spelled day + advance + month + walk.
